code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./Dashboard.css';import logo from'./assets/logo.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=_ref=>{let{userEmail,onLogout}=_ref;const[available,setAvailable]=useState(true);const[profile,setProfile]=useState({name:'',email:'',password:''});const handleProfileChange=e=>{setProfile({...profile,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"Logo",className:"dashboard-logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Welcome, ",userEmail]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"logout-btn",onClick:onLogout,children:"Logout"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Upcoming Games"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"May 10, 2025 - Soccer Match @ 2:00 PM"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"May 12, 2025 - Basketball Game @ 4:30 PM"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Availability"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:available,onChange:()=>setAvailable(!available)}),"Available for Games"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Profile Information"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"Name",value:profile.name,onChange:handleProfileChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:profile.email,onChange:handleProfileChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",name:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:profile.password,onChange:handleProfileChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Update Profile"})]})]});};export default Dashboard;
